attributes.action: Allow full public disclosure of MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently MP's do not allow public scrutiny of their expenses.  I suggest when an MP is canvassing for re-election we should request to know how much he/she has claimed in expenses and allowances in the previous term - failure to provide the information should trigger a no vote for that candidate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
